WorksyHr WorksyHR Getting Ready... Let\'s Get Started Welcome to \n WorksyHR Don’t have an account? Register
Choose your preferred login method. Log in with Company ID Log in with Email Log in with Mobile Number or login with
Company ID Username Password Enter your company id Enter your Username Enter your password Remember me Forgot Password Login Login to your Account Enter your company id & username to login. Email Address Mobile Number cancel Enter your Mobile Number Enter your mobile number to login Enter your email and password to login.
Create a New Account Please put your below to create a new account \nfor using this app. Confirm your password Enter your email Address I agree to Worksy\'s License Agreement, \n Terms, & Privacy Policy Register Now New Password Re-enter your password
Reset your Password Please enter your email and we will send OTP \n code in the next step to reset your password. Send OTP Code
OTP Code Verification We have sent an 6 digit OTP code to your email dav***ol@email.com.Enter the OTP code \nbelow to verify, Didn’t receive an email? You can resend code in 21 s
Create New Password> Create your new Password. If you forget it, no \n worry, you can reset again with forgot password.> Confirm Reset Password Password Successfully Changed! Please wait...
Back Skip Continue Just a few steps away! To get things rolling with this app, we just need a little bit of authentication Biometric Login enable Biometric for seamless login and authentication Camera Allow worksy to use your camera. Notification Enable push notification so we can send you updates right away! Set up Clock Device Register this device as your clock in device to enable clock-in functionality. Set it Up Done You’re all set! We hope you have a great experience with worksy!
Do you want to allow “Worksy” to use Face ID? Use Face ID to authenticate on Worksy. Allow Don\'t Allow
Why do i have to link my account to this device? Posted on 16 Jun, 2023 Linking your account enables clock-in functionality. If you choose not to link your account, you won\'t be able to clock in, but you can still access other functions and features.\n \n To uphold security measures, only one device can be linked to your account at a time. Once your account is linked on this device, clocking in on other devices will not be possible to ensure the security of your information.
Company Selection Please select a company to continue. Company A Company B Company C Company D Don’t ask me again Set as default company to log in.
Home Request Approval Notification Menu
Travel Request Search In Progress Completed Press and hold to select multiple item. Type Destination Date Budget Summary Next Save for Later Where are you travelling to? Location Country Address (if applicable) Travel Details Fill in the details of your travelling Title Description Date Start Date End Duration Reason Are you travelling alone? Fill in the details of your travel. Yes No Additional Traveller Select User Estimated Cost What are the estimated costings? Budget Item Claim Estimated Cost Item Select the relevant estimated claim item. Budget Amount Remarks Add Claim Item Custom Field
My Claim CL-110 Monthly entitlement claim Total Form Details Select and fill in the details of the form you selected. Claim Item Total Claim Create Form Upload File Choose from your album Scan QR Code Select From Reciepts New Claim Item Fill in the details of the claim. Claim Group Amount inc. Tax Tax SVG, PNG, JPG or GIF (max. 800x400px) Add Another Submit Form Cancel Request Edit Edit Claim Item
Claim Approval
By submitting this form you accept Send2\'s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy Forgot Password? Register Minimum length of eight characters, at least one uppercase character, at least one lowercase character, at least one number, and at least one symbol Get money transfer\noptions with better rates Send more money home with Send2 EMAIL (OPTIONAL) Keep track of the latest \n exchange rates exchange rates MainActivity2 Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Android Studio android.studio@android.com Navigation header Settings
